Fostering common heritage and national identity
Kenyan Community in BC

What We Do

Stronger Together

Community

We are dedicated to fostering connections, building bridges, and creating a sense of belonging for all.

Volunteer

Our community seeks to develop the next generation of leaders. We provide multiple forums to give back and collaborate.

Mental Health

We are dedicated to fostering connections, building bridges, and creating a sense of belonging for all.

Integration

We provide comprehensive resources and guidance to help newcomers navigate the new environment with confidence and dignity.

Events

Through events, programs, and outreach initiatives, we strive to unite members, sparking meaningful interactions and collaborations that strengthen our community.

Benevolence

We support our members as they grieve lost loved ones. Our members mobilize to provide support and care for the bereaved.

Events

Some of our past events.
Kenyan Heritage Gala
A celebration of Kenyan culture
Mothers' Day 2023
Appreciating mothers in our community
Surrey Fusion Festival
We participate in multicultural events
Boniface Mwangi Talk
Inspiring talk by the "People's Watchman"
Financial Literacy Session
Teaching our community about personal finance
Mental Health and Wellness
We have recurring series on mental health
Learn about upcoming events
